name: Vinted Actual Price
description:
Calculates and displays the actual amount you would pay for of a product on Vinted, including protection and shipping fees.
Note that the calculated price is purely indicative, and as it is possible to buy multiple products from the same seller, the inclusion of the shipping fees in the calculated price may be redundant and the given a final price would not be representative of what you would actually pay.

Of course, this project is in no form associated with the Vinted company.
